code: import React from'react';import'./CSS/Signup.css';import{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Signup=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const signupUser=()=>{axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/signup",{email:email,username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){console.log(response);window.location.href="/";}).catch(function(error){console.log(error,'error');if(error.response.status===401){alert("Invalid Credentials");}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Signup"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"textbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Email",value:email,name:"email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"textbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,name:"username",onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"textbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,name:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"remember-me",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:"remember",name:"remember"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Remember Me"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn",onClick:()=>signupUser(),children:"Sign Up"})]})});};export default Signup;
